meanings.sent1: The rumoring in the school caused a lot of confusion.
meanings.sent2: I heard some rumoring about a new student joining our class.
meanings.sent3: The rumoring at the party was so exaggerated, it was almost funny.
meanings.sent4: Her constant rumoring turned the workplace into a gossip hub.
meanings.sent5: The rumoring in the small town spread faster than wildfire.

meanings.sent1: She was caught rumoring about her friend's secret.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy rumoring about celebrities and their lives.
meanings.sent3: He was rumoring so much that no one believed him anymore.
meanings.sent4: The politician was rumoring to gain an advantage in the election.
meanings.sent5: Rumoring can harm relationships and trust among friends.
